title.en: Prayer for the Dawning of Clear Light

text.en: The mere thought of you banishes the anxieties of existence and quiescence,
text.en-trans: drenpa tsam gyi sizhi jik trokpa

text.en: Glorious guru, beacon who dispels the darkness,
text.en-trans: palden lama münsel drönmé nyi

text.en: Take your seat upon the lotus in my heart
text.en-trans: dak gi nyingga pemé den zhuk né

text.en: And inspire the dawn of naturally arisen clear light.
text.en-trans: rangjung ösal charwar jingyi lob

text.en: I have been subject to the murky gloom of delusion,
text.en-trans: tokmé dü né marik timuk gi

text.en: A nescience that’s endured throughout beginningless time.
text.en-trans: münpar nyi tuk drakpö nönpa dak

text.en: Now, in your kindness, O precious guru, inspire me
text.en-trans: jetsün lamé drin gyi khyö tuk dang

text.en: To realise how your wisdom and my mind are indivisible.
text.en-trans: rangsem yermé shepar jingyi lob

text.en: Let my own clear, empty awareness dawn as the guru’s wisdom—
text.en-trans: rangrig saltong lamé tuk su shar

text.en: Profound, peaceful, unelaborate and uncompounded clear light.
text.en-trans: zab zhi trödral ösal dümajé

text.en: Inspire me with the ability to focus my mind inseparably
text.en-trans: kyemé a yikkar po öbar bar

text.en: On the white A, syllable of the unborn, blazing in radiance.
text.en-trans: sem zin yermé sé nü jingyi lob

text.en: Let its light illuminate the whole world, outer and inner,
text.en-trans: dé yi ö kyi chinang nöchü kün

text.en: Environment and inhabitants, in wisdom luminosity,
text.en-trans: yeshe ö kyi salwar gyurpa dang

text.en: And purify the dark of slumber and ālaya into basic space.
text.en-trans: nyi tuk künzhi münpa ying su dak

text.en: Inspire me to recognize both coarse and subtle luminosity.
text.en-trans: sab tuk ösal zinpar jingyi lob

text.en: Untainted by the obscurations of dualistic thought,
text.en-trans: zungdzin tokpé dribpé magöpa

text.en: In a clear state wherein all perception, pure and impure,
text.en-trans: dak dang ma daknang ba tamché kün

text.en: Is experienced without any clinging to a self,
text.en-trans: nang yang ngardzin mepa salwé ngang

text.en: Inspire me to gain the stability of familiarity.
text.en-trans: gom dri tenpa tobpar jingyi lob

text.en: Inspire me, glorious guru of my own awareness,
text.en-trans: detar tsönpé tsé dir drolwa am

text.en: So that through such diligent application,
text.en-trans: bardo ösal rang ngoshepa dang

text.en: I may gain liberation in this life or recognize the bardo’s clear light
text.en-trans: chönyi denpa ngönsum tokpa ru

text.en: And directly realize the truth of dharmatā.
text.en-trans: rangrig palden lamé jingyi lob
